Active Info Display, Tilting And Sliding Panoramic Sunroof, Park Distance Control, Led Headlamps + Separate Daytime Running Lights, Led Rear Combination Lamp, Mobile Phone Interface, App-connect, Tire Pressure Monitoring System, Rain Sensor, Cruise Control System Incl. Speed Limiter, Driver Alert System, Hill Start Assist, Executive Comfort Equipment, Leather-wrapped Multi-function Steering Wheel, Radio Composition Media

This is a Brand-New Vehicle. You at the right place - three times “VOLKSWAGEN DEALER OF THE YEAR” & nine times “VOLKSWAGEN CLUB OF EXCELLENCE” winners. Rated # 1 in Service! Nationwide delivery, Fantastic Trade-in offers, In-house vehicle finance services offered with all major banks.  We specialise in online sales, no need to leave your home.  * All specials and discounted stock are subject to in-house finance * Listed price excludes all fees/costs.  * Some pictures might vary from actual vehicle, we do our best to ensure accuracy : )  Our General Sales Manager is Marco Meijer.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
